contraindications.disease: The most common adverse events reported in clinical trials were ankle oedema 6 headache 3 8 palpitation 2 7 flushing 2 2 dizziness 1 6 rash 0 5 and fatigue 0 5 A7845
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Manidipine produces vasodilation resulting in lower blood pressure A7845
